title: Belgium and the Netherlands
brief_description: A survey of Belgium and the Netherlands, their relationship to each other and to their neighbours. Explains how their culture and economy are affected by environmental factors such as easy access to the North Sea, their small size and dense population and their coal resources. No other credits available.
